## :page_with_curl: Description
This is my own design system, it contains a series of visual elements and styling patterns that I use in my everyday life.

## :game_die: Components

- [x] Text 
- [x] Heading
- [x] Box 
- [x] Button 
- [x] TextInput
- [x] TextArea
- [x] Checkbox
- [x] Avatar
- [x] MultiStep

## :gear: Running

### Fork and Clone
```
git clone https://github.com/<your-profile>/sapuris-design-system
```

### Install dependencies
```
npm install
```

### Run app with Turborepo
```
npm run dev
```
